column4: hello.i need some help concerning my tv card,it is a win tv theater,bt878 chip card.i have installed tvtime,but tvtime say,that there isn't any signal at all.i'm a linux newbie.please help!
you need to make sure that the Video4Linux drivers are installed and configured.
there are a few V4L HOWTOs around. The BT878 chip is pretty well supported.
this is a bit old but probably a good starting point: http://www.faqs.org/docs/Linux-mini/BTTV.html
